author: ianna
body:
#### PR description:

*ProdCutsForProtons* is added to all xml fragments defining production cuts. The value is set to be equal to *ProdCutsForElectrons* - as it's done in its initialisation here: https://cmssdt.cern.ch/lxr/source/SimG4Core/Geometry/src/DDG4ProductionCuts.cc#0138

As discussed with @civanch and @cvuosalo

title: Sim: Add a Production Cut on Proton equal to the one on Electron
